name: Lazy Jones Rides Again
overview: Published in Commodore Horizons 1985/02. Lazy Jones is an idle hotel cleaner who would rather play video games than do any work. Move Jones around the hotel floors, trying out each video game while avoiding the manager and the deadly cleaning trolley. In the games move your missile projectors and fire when the spinning artefact is aligned between them. Each time you hit the artifact it changes colors and you score points. Remember, you are playing against a time limit.
